subsection_content:
Helminths are not transmitted directly from person to person, people get sick by eating animal meat, especially raw, undercooked pork.
Transmission route of trichinosis: the disease is transmitted through food, especially the habit of eating pig's blood pudding, eating raw pork, eating undercooked meat... infected with trichinic larvae.
subsection_data:
giun xoan.json. Cause of trichinosis
Helminths are not transmitted directly from person to person, people get sick by eating animal meat, especially raw, undercooked pork.
Transmission route of trichinosis: the disease is transmitted through food, especially the habit of eating pig's blood pudding, eating raw pork, eating undercooked meat... infected with trichinic larvae.
